Question: Turnout was 82.2 percent, with this person winning the free Northern states, as well as California and Oregon.
Hints: This person "was remarkably fond of children", and the ____s were not considered to be strict with their children.
Bennett won wide attention when he called this person a white supremacist in 1968.
This person served as New Salem's postmaster and later as county surveyor, all the while reading voraciously.
